name: coolify-cli
description: Manage Coolify self-hosted PaaS from the terminal. Multi-instance contexts, application lifecycle (deploy, logs, env sync), database provisioning with backups, service management, and CI/CD automation via JSON output. Use when: deploying apps via Coolify CLI, managing servers/databases/services, syncing environment variables, automating Coolify workflows, or troubleshooting cannot unmarshal array, 404 on service env update, context authentication failures.
